amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which places an overall spending cap on expenditures for energy supply research and development in fiscal years 1996-1998 to an amount equal to the funds obligated in fiscal year 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill placing an overall spending cap on expenditures for energy supply research and development in FYs 1996-1998 to an amount equal to the funds obligated for FY 1995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (CA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 257 (Roll no. 307).
